comment.author: 62233671@N03
comment._content: This may seem like a silly question, but the sanatorium and the hog farm were separate entities, correct?

comment.realname: University of Washington Libraries Digital Collections
comment.author: 8337233@N06
comment._content: That is a confusing title, isn't it? I believe the hog farm was a separate entity contracted to collect edible garbage from the sanatorium to feed its animals. At least that is what I gathered from an internet search that turned up this legal document - 174.123.24.242/leagle/xmlResult.aspx?xmldoc=195547446Wn2d...

comment.author: 62233671@N03
comment._content: Thanks for that quick response. What an interesting idea.
